data.value: Not because I grew old and tired, but because no one – except those…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0325
data.value: …in my closest circle – believed in my findings.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0326
data.value: So, what are you saying?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0327
data.value: I am prepared to offer my services and full support to you.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0328
data.value: …In exchange for…?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0329
data.value: No exchange necessary. However, consider my situation here. I am cut off from…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0330
data.value: …communication and commerce routes. And those damn Raider war parties have…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0331
data.value: …already hit my base twice. Each time they destroyed or stole some of my equipment.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0332
data.value: We can take you with us.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0333
data.value: I’m of better use here with my lab and tools.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0334
data.value: So what can we do?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0335
data.value: In case you happen to run into some long-range antenna components, bring them here and…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0336
data.value: …help me build an array. That way we can stay in contact over a distance.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0337
data.value: Also, one of the Raider warparties has established a temporary camp a few asteroids…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0338
data.value: …from here. It’s only a matter of time before they come here to loot again.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0339
data.value: You’d like us to exterminate them and secure the area?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0340
data.value: It… would be helpful.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0341
data.value: Fine.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0342
data.value: So that’s it. Knock out a Raider warparty and search for long-range transmitter parts…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0344
data.value: On our way.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0345
data.value: We can talk on the way. There are still issues to be… discussed.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0401
data.value: Okay, team, I suggest dealing with those Raiders first.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0402
data.value: Agreed. Best to make sure Barth will be here next time we arrive.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0403
data.value: Thomas? So you believe there’s something to this?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0404
data.value: That there are aliens involved?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0405
data.value: No one has ever seen one… At least not in the past few thousand years.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0406
data.value: Past few thousand years?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0407
data.value: Oh, yes, I remember from your classes: you believe there were “leaps” in the evolution…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0408
data.value: …of mankind.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0409
data.value: “Leaps”?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0410
data.value: Mankind’s evolution was not, shall we say, continuous. There are very important missing…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0411
data.value: …links in the chain. You see, our evolution typically progressed in a gradual manner…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0412
data.value: …for long periods of time.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0413
data.value: But at certain evolutionary moments? A leap occurred. A leap for which we can find…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0414
data.value: …no rational explanation.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0415
data.value: Previously nonexistent genes appeared. Nothing that can be explained as a combination…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0416
data.value: …of any known species.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0417
data.value: Something new.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0418
data.value: You’re suggesting that… we have… alien genes?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0419
data.value: I do. Most indications suggest that our species was intentionally altered.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0420
data.value: I call it genome implantation. Something we humans have been experimenting with for…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0421
data.value: …the last few decades. But there is… indirect evidence to believe that this has been…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0422
data.value: …done before. To us. Intentionally.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0423
data.value: What the hell does that have to do with us and our current situation?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0424
data.value: And what are we supposed to do about it? I mean – right now.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0425
data.value: Well, don’t forget that a pirate base was also mentioned in the Russians’ communication.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0426
data.value: Right. We will find out sooner or later. Once you take out the Raiders, check out that…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0427
data.value: …location you know about from the Russians.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0501
data.value: This must be their place.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0502
data.value: Definitely. There are no reported settlements in this area. Gotta be the Raiders’ camp.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0503
data.value: And… our plan?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0504
data.value: I don’t expect them to negotiate. All these people know is looting and plundering.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0601
data.value: You dare approach our settlement?

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0602
data.value: We’re here to end your looting spree.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0603
data.value: You are either brave or foolish. Or both. I’ll do you the service…

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0604
data.value: …of letting you die like a man.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0605
data.value: Challenge accepted.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0701
data.value: Looks like we’re done here.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0702
data.value: Good job, guys!

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0703
data.value: Now to the pirate base in the Damien Dust Field. The one mentioned in the data from Laika.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0704
data.value: Your wish is my command. Jump in, I’ve already set the course.

data.name: Dlg_BarthsMoonConvince_0705
data.value: Affirmative.

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_BEHIND01
data.value: I’ll get you, freak!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_BEHIND02
data.value: You think you can outrun me?

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_BEHIND03
data.value: Don’t get used to the lead!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_BEHIND04
data.value: Comin’ to get ya!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_BEHIND05
data.value: You won’t get far!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_FRONT01
data.value: Who’s the boss? Ha, ha, I’m unstoppable!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_FRONT02
data.value: Loser! Eat my wind!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_FRONT03
data.value: My grandma flies faster than you!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_FRONT04
data.value: Stop wasting your time. You’ve already lost!

data.name: Dlg_Challenger_0100_FRONT05
data.value: See my back? That’s all you’ll ever see!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0100
data.value: The Junkyard again. (grunts) Let’s just do what we came here for and get out.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0101
data.value: You don’t want to stay for a little R&R? Or maybe some… research?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0102
data.value: Look at these people. This place makes me sick.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0103
data.value: It’s none of our business.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0104
data.value: We’re here for Manjeet. He should be somewhere in the city. Let’s find him.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0200
data.value: Oh, my friends. You have made it. So nice to see you again…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0201
data.value: Do you have good news for me?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0202
data.value: How ’bout a fully loaded transporter waiting outside the city.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0203
data.value: Wonderful! It’s really quite a pleasure to do business with you my friends.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0204
data.value: We’ve fulfilled our part of the agreement, now it’s your turn.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0205
data.value: I believe you have a little souvenir for us.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0206
data.value: In time, my friend. You don’t rush fine wine. I will inspect the cargo first.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0207
data.value: Meet me later by the transporter and don’t try anything fun–

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0208
data.value: Really? You can’t be serious? You can't be serious! This is your ship? This is your ship?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0209
data.value: Piss off, pal. We don’t have time for children’s games

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0210
data.value: No, seriously. Where did you get this thing? No, let me guess – you built it yourself.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0211
data.value: From dog shit. That explains a lot…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0212
data.value: Well, at least we don’t live in dog shit.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0213
data.value: My ship could eat yours for breakfast and crap out the bones.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0214
data.value: Ohh, tough guy. Let’s see what you’ve got.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0215
data.value: Me and you, one lap around the Junkyard. Or are you too scared?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0216
data.value: Apollo, don’t do this. Junkyard racing is brutal. It’s not worth the risk.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0217
data.value: And we don’t have time.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0218
data.value: It’ll only take a few minutes. Someone needs to teach this guy some respect.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0219
data.value: Ha! That’s the word. So let’s get it on.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0220
data.value: When you’re done, come back to me.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0300
data.value: You’re going to beg for my mercy.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0301
data.value: I’m shivering. Let’s get this over with.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0400
data.value: A little applause from your fans! Oh look, they like you!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0401
data.value: You bastard! You’ll pay for this, big time!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0500
data.value: Oops, watch the road hazard!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0501
data.value: Just blow it up!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0600
data.value: Beware of those green clouds, they are highly radioactive toxic vapours!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0700
data.value: Don’t give up! You’re past the worst! Keep it up!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0800
data.value: Come on brother! Show him how to fly!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_0900
data.value: Minefield front and center. Careful!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1000
data.value: Share some bullets with him. That should slow him down!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1100
data.value: Ok, you’re heading into the last leg. The forge. Just don’t touch the walls!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1200
data.value: I see you Apollo. You’re almost there! One more curve, then a straightaway to the finish!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1300
data.value: That was awesome, brother! You owned him!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1301
data.value: Nicely done, Apollo! Glad to see you in one piece.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1302
data.value: That’s impossible! You couldn’t have won!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1303
data.value: If you want a rematch, my grandma’s ready to roll.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1304
data.value: Whatever. Get out of my sight before I really get pissed off.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1305
data.value: Don’t you think you owe the victor a prize?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1306
data.value: Your prize is me not killing you. IF you leave NOW.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1307
data.value: Oh, he’s such a little weasel.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1308
data.value: I wonder what his ship would look like turned to scrap metal…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1309
data.value: Forget it. Your bullets are worth more than that piece of crap.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1310
data.value: Yeah. I guess you’re right. Let’s just find Manjeet.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1400
data.value: So, who won the race?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1401
data.value: Three guesses. First two don’t count.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1402
data.value: Glad to hear it. But there’s a little problem with your cargo…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1403
data.value: What are you talking about? We almost killed ourselves for that stuff?!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1404
data.value: TARJA, LOAD YOUR WEAPONS!!!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1405
data.value: Just kidding, just kidding. Everything is fine. I will give you the item we agreed upon.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1406
data.value: Valentin, my friend, you need to switch to decaf.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1407
data.value: Sorry. When it comes to risking my life and not getting paid, I have “issues”.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1408
data.value: Ok, just give us the artifact so we can get out of here.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1409
data.value: I’m looking forward to never coming back here again.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1410
data.value: Of course. I loaded it into the cargo hold of your mothership.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1411
data.value: Copy that. Artifact loaded on Sapho.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1412
data.value: And here is a little bonus for a job well done.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1413
data.value: Take care of yourselves, my friends. Perhaps we’ll do business again.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1414
data.value: We sincerely hope not.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1415
data.value: Thomas, do you copy?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1416
data.value: I am online. Were you successful?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1417
data.value: We have this alien thing.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1418
data.value: Tell me about it!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1419
data.value: Looks more like Rosetta Stone than a superhuman device.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1420
data.value: What did you expect? Light sabers and plasma guns?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1421
data.value: What should we do with it?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1422
data.value: Drop it by my place, I will give it thorough examination.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1423
data.value: Only one of you needs to do the delivery – the rest of you, head on over to Valiant.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1424
data.value: Valiant? You mean the Templar fortress?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1425
data.value: Exactly. I checked some reliable sources and I am 99% sure the Templars stumbled…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1426
data.value: …upon one of the artifact pieces. You must check it out.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1427
data.value: On our way, then. I’ll take the artifact to Barth’s moon and we’ll meet up at Valiant.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1428
data.value: Chill a bit, guys, I might be a little late.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1429
data.value: We’ll take the scenic route and meet you at the gates of Valiant.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardReturn_1430
data.value: Ok, Apollo, Valentin, Tarja – dock in!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_01_01
data.value: This is the place.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_01_02
data.value: Too many sharp metal objects. I can’t proceed any further, you’re on your own.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_01_03
data.value: Any idea where the smuggler might be?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_01_04
data.value: I’ve been here before. It’s a small community. Everyone knows everyone.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_01_05
data.value: What do you suggest?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_01_06
data.value: I know a guy. Hangs around Old Shard tavern.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_02_01
data.value: By the way, Marcus. How do you know a seedy place like this?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_02_02
data.value: Um… research.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_02_03
data.value: Ok, whatever.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_01
data.value: Marcus, is that you?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_02
data.value: You said know a guy around here.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_03
data.value: Guy: it’s a generic term. Like I said, research.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_04
data.value: It’s been years! You just left and I never–

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_05
data.value: You and I can talk privately later, Tarja. We’re here for other matters.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_06
data.value: Such as?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_07
data.value: We’re looking for one Hindu guy. A smuggler by the name Manjeet.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_08
data.value: Sold you some rare “antiquity”, and you just found out it was a cheese grater from Q-Mart?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_09
data.value: We never met him before. But we heard he has… something.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_10
data.value: Something we’re interested in.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_11
data.value: Be gentle with him.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_12
data.value: He may not be the bravest or the most virtuous man, or even the most… well, you get it.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_13
data.value: But he’s a friend.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_14
data.value: Duly noted.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_15
data.value: The last time I saw him was in the upper docks. Harbor district.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_16
data.value: We’ll check it out.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_03_17
data.value: Good luck finding… what you’re after.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_04_01
data.value: Shit! Zappa, I promise, I will deliver the “goods” in two hours!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_04_02
data.value: I give you my word…–

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_04_03
data.value: Ehm, we’re looking for…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_04_04
data.value: I won’t take this crap!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_04_05
data.value: You won’t screw with Manjeet – not anymore! …

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_04_06
data.value: Guys, take out these brigands!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_01
data.value: I… I can pay you more than Zappa! I swear! Just –

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_02
data.value: Calm down. We want to buy something from you.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_03
data.value: Oh. I nearly had a heart attack.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_04
data.value: I’d love to do business, but this Momo Zappa and his gang are after me at the moment.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_05
data.value: We noticed.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_06
data.value: How about a deal?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_07
data.value: Get rid of those bastards and I will sell you my secret, top-of-the-line goods.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_08
data.value: With 15% discount!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_05_09
data.value: All right, don’t go anywhere.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_01
data.value: Who is this Zappa, anyway?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_02
data.value: Head of some local gang. There are hundreds of guys like him around.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_03
data.value: Why do you think Manjeet has a dispute with this particular one?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_04
data.value: Better not to ask. Drugs, women, weapons? This is none of our business.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_05
data.value: Let’s just get the job done.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_06
data.value: Here we go.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_07
data.value: Watchoo want? Go playin’ somewhere else, this’ our quarter.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_08
data.value: Manjeet sent us.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_09
data.value: If you’re lookin’ for Momo, you come to the right place.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_10
data.value: Except. Could be the wrong place for you.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_11
data.value: Why you riskin’ your life for that scrote sack, Manjeet?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_12
data.value: We have an agreement. You can understand that.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_06_13
data.value: Here’s what I understand!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_07_01
data.value: Manjeet’s trigger men! You dare disrespect me? Do you know who I am?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_07_02
data.value: That’s why we’re here.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_01
data.value: I am most impressed! Come back and browse through the finest selection of bright material.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_02
data.value: Bright material?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_03
data.value: You know, active nuclear gadgets. You came for a trade, right?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_04
data.value: We came for an artifact you bought from the pirates.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_05
data.value: Ah, the artifact. Sadly, that item is not for sale. Too expensive for you.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_06
data.value: But our agreement still stands – all nuclear material you can imagine, plus 15% dis–

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_07
data.value: How much do you want for the artifact?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_08
data.value: Far, far too much for likes of you. No offense. Thirteen million, not a penny less.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_09
data.value: As I said, too rich for your blood.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_10
data.value: What if we kill you right here and take it ourselves?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_11
data.value: I am not so stupid. Such expensive items… I keep them with friends.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_12
data.value: If you kill me or threaten me, you will never get it.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_13
data.value: You want to keep the artifact for yourself or sell it to the highest bidder?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_14
data.value: Option B is more to my liking.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_15
data.value: What about this: We did you a favor once, we’ll do you a second one.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_16
data.value: I bet a guy like you has a lot of enemies.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_17
data.value: I am fine now. As long as Zappa is dead, my friends can get me out of troubles…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_18
data.value: …except…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_19
data.value: Yes?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_20
data.value: There is something I want. Perhaps we might barter.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_21
data.value: Get me a cargo ship full of plutonium and you have a deal.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_22
data.value: That should be doable.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_23
data.value: Hijack a cargo ship, fly to some plutonium-rich asteroid field, fill it up…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_24
data.value: We’ll be back in a few hours.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_25
data.value: No, my friend. If I wanted plutonium ore, I could get it myself.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_26
data.value: I want a cargo ship full of REFINED plutonium. Military grade.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_27
data.value: Good Lord. What would you do with something like that?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_28
data.value: That’s my business. I have very… diversified enterprises.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_29
data.value: Where the hell could we get our hands on a cargo ship full of military grade plutonium?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_30
data.value: The Chinese. They have loads of the stuff.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_31
data.value: I assume you have some specific details.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_32
data.value: A complete plan, and a good one, too!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_33
data.value: I just couldn’t find anyone stu– brave enough to do it for me.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_34
data.value: There is a plutonium refinery at Jingzhou. You can’t take it by force.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_35
data.value: And you can’t steal one of the ships loaded with refined plutonium.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_36
data.value: They are too heavily guarded. So…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_37
data.value: You need to steal one of the poorly protected ships leaving the mining colony of Changde.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_38
data.value: Fly with it to Jingzhou. Unload the ore and then load it up with the refined stuff.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_39
data.value: Piece of cake! Why didn’t we think of that?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_40
data.value: It might actually work.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_41
data.value: Can we trust him? Maybe he just wants us to get killed?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_42
data.value: Nah. He wants the stuff so badly he can taste it.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_43
data.value: Okay. We’re in.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_44
data.value: Perfect. I transmitted you all the coordinates and relevant data.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_45
data.value: Once you are ready, set a course for Changde.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_46
data.value: Just before departure, pick up some explosives from my auxiliary depot.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_47
data.value: You might find them useful.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_48
data.value: Guys, I’m going to do a little more… research.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_08_49
data.value: Apollo, get those explosives, we’ll meet at Sapho.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_01
data.value: You here for a delivery for Manjeet?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_02
data.value: You know it.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_03
data.value: Your “package” is ready. And please, send my regards to Mr. Lata.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_04
data.value: Thanks.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_05
data.value: That was easy.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_06
data.value: Marcus, I’m ready, how about you? How’s that research coming?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_07
data.value: I need to probe a little… deeper. Why don’t you come here?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_08
data.value: On my way.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_09
data.value: As soon as possible.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_09_10
data.value: Uhm, roger that.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_01
data.value: What’s going on here? Some kind of key-swapping party tonight?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_02
data.value: No need to be rude, Mr. Rainier. A friend of ours got into some trouble.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_03
data.value: Just shut up and watch.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_04
data.value: …that stuff you sold us last time –

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_05
data.value: What’s the problem with it?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_06
data.value: One of our boys died after sniffing a gram!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_07
data.value: Tragic. You guys know this stuff can have side effects.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_08
data.value: Bullshit! It was bad and you know it.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_09
data.value: And your point is…?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_10
data.value: I want my money back.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_11
data.value: You should have read the fine print. No refunds.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_10_12
data.value: Guys, give this jag-off a refund!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_11_01
data.value: We need to help my friend Valentin. Marcus? Apollo.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_11_02
data.value: Friends are friends, I guess.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_11_03
data.value: Whatever.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_01
data.value: Thank you, whoever you are.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_02
data.value: Friends of a friend.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_03
data.value: You fight well. Are you EAC militia?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_04
data.value: Freelancers. Just doing our business.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_05
data.value: Valentin, they’re after something big. Something that can lead to loads of cash.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_06
data.value: I’m listening.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_07
data.value: We could use a hand. In return we offer, um, high adventure. And a share of the loot.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_08
data.value: I’m in. Just like old times.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_09
data.value: Old times?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_10
data.value: It seems I have some explaining for you and Madelyn. We’ll save it for later.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_11
data.value: Let’s head back to Sapho. Destination Changde.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_12
data.value: Valentin, you with us?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_12_13
data.value: Like a bad case of crabs!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_13_01
data.value: Have a nice time, Marcus?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_13_02
data.value: I’ve always been fond of research.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_13_03
data.value: I see we have company.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_13_04
data.value: We’ll save the introductions for later. We’re heading for Changde.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardConvince_13_05
data.value: You got it. We’ll talk on the way. And we WILL talk.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0100
data.value: We’re not too late, I hope.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0101
data.value: But I’m picking signals from several slaver mother ships.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0102
data.value: Let’s get this done fast.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0103
data.value: We’re on our way.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0200
data.value: Reinforcements? This base should have been unarmed, no defense fleet!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0201
data.value: This was not part of our contract. …

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0207
data.value: Go away, strangers. This is none of your business.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0208
data.value: We’re here to help these people.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0209
data.value: And you stand in our way.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0210
data.value: You want trouble, you’ve got it.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0300
data.value: You… are you here to help us? Did you receive our call?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0301
data.value: We did.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0302
data.value: Please, hurry. A few of us are still here, the rest are being hauled away in cages.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0303
data.value: For now, hit the remaining raiding ships!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0304
data.value: At least that will save those who are still alive.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0305
data.value: Roger.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0400
data.value: May God bless you!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0402
data.value: Are we done here?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0403
data.value: No! We still need your help.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0404
data.value: The colony is safe, for now, but their cargo ships are full of our people.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0405
data.value: They’ve already left, but you should be able to catch up with them.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0408
data.value: We’ll do what we can.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0500
data.value: These must be the slave transports.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0501
data.value: Remember what the old man said. Don’t destroy the ships or the prisoners will die.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0503
data.value: Acknowledged.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0600
data.value: Job done. Transports disabled.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0601
data.value: Thank you again!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0602
data.value: So, are you safe now? We have other matters to attend to.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0603
data.value: Please… Wait! One more thing! It seems some of those slavers have…

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0604
data.value: …gotten into our underground shafts.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0605
data.value: They’ve somehow damaged our power generator, along with the gas vents.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0606
data.value: Without that equipment, even the few of us who remain here will die within hours.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0607
data.value: How do we get into the shafts?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0608
data.value: The entrances are marked with red lights.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0609
data.value: You can’t miss them. Once you’re inside, watch out for slaver ships.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0700
data.value: How many ships should we expect?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0701
data.value: Only a handful. But… eh…

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0702
data.value: Yes?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0703
data.value: Be careful. The generator is an old Russian nuclear model we got for cheap.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0704
data.value: Now that it’s been damaged, it’s leaking radiation all around.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0713
data.value: Let’s get to work.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0714
data.value: Fast. Roust the slavers, fix the leaking generator, and perform the minor repairs.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0800
data.value: This must be the entry.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0801
data.value: Looks like it.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0900
data.value: Jeff, you think we’ve done enough here?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0901
data.value: You hit the gas vents?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0902
data.value: Made holes in the pipes. In a few minutes, this whole place could blow.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0909
data.value: Good. Then let’s scram.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_0910
data.value: In about three minutes this little piece of heaven is going to turn into Hell.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1000
data.value: Shit!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1001
data.value: We need to intercept those two ships before they exit.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1002
data.value: Otherwise they’ll blow the whole asteroid.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1007
data.value: Let’s hurry and find those two ships.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1100
data.value: Ah, brave Christians. You come to offer us a parting prayer?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1200
data.value: We need to disable those explosives.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1300
data.value: See those gas clouds? Don’t make any sparks around them.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1301
data.value: No fireworks today?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1302
data.value: We’ll have to wait for New Year!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1400
data.value: Done. Disarmed–

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1401
data.value: Good.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1402
data.value: These vents seem like the source of the leaking gas.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1403
data.value: Yep, these are the leaks we’re looking for.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1500
data.value: One more.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1600
data.value: Done.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1700
data.value: I have a bad feeling about this place.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1701
data.value: Radiation. Hope you don’t mind little black spots on your face.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1702
data.value: We need to be really fast here.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1800
data.value: That’s it. The damaged nuclear generator.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1900
data.value: Good. Radiation stopped.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1901
data.value: Get out of there anyway. Fixing the core doesn’t eliminate the ambient radiation.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1902
data.value: Right. Note to self: next trip, pack anti-radiation meds.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1904
data.value: Great work in the basement, guys!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1907
data.value: Let’s get back to the surface.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_1908
data.value: Say hello to Father Tobias, then and say goodbye.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2000
data.value: Thank you, thank you, my friends!

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2001
data.value: You’re welcome.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2005
data.value: And what’s your status here? NOW can we be on our way?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2006
data.value: They damaged much of our base and killed many of our people.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2007
data.value: But we are strong. It will take months to get things back to normal…

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2008
data.value: …but with the guidance of heaven, nothing is impossible.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2010
data.value: Marcus, Apollo – good news. Still want to meet that smuggler, Manjeet?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2011
data.value: Definitely. Did he agree on a meeting?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2012
data.value: Well, not exactly. But rumor has it he’s currently at Duncan’s Faith.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2013
data.value: I suggest we head there and ask around. Lorraine out.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2014
data.value: Duncan’s Faith?

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2015
data.value: Fancy name for the Junkyard.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2016
data.value: It was a battlefield during the war between EAC and Fourth Reich.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2017
data.value: The place where the last battle occurred.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2018
data.value: Officially, it’s called Duncan’s Faith after the EAC army commander.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2019
data.value: But everyone calls it the Junkyard…

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2020
data.value: …’cause there’s thousands tons of metal parts floating around.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2021
data.value: Sounds like an adventure.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2022
data.value: Sounds like an intergalactic yard sale.

data.name: Dlg_LastHope_2023
data.value: I’m ready whenever you are, guys.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0602
data.value: Right, tomorrow we’ll check out the Marimba Club.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0602a
data.value: Stuart was there last week and he said the chicks are hot and they like to…

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0603
data.value: Ok, probably not important.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0702
data.value: You’ll regret this… I’m going to tell all my friends and…

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0703
data.value: One more word and you’ll be talkin’ out of a new hole, pal.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0703a
data.value: The one I’m going to rip in your neck.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0704
data.value: Ah, the squalid human drama! I’m starting to enjoy this job.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0705
data.value: Quiet! I think I’ve got something.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0802
data.value: Ok, I’ll take care of inventory today.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0803
data.value: Better hurry. We’ve got lots of customers today and not much in a reserve.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_0805
data.value: Apollo, tail this guy.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1002
data.value: What? Damn!

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1003
data.value: This may seriously impact our working relationship. Guys, take care of the nosy bitch!

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1004
data.value: We’ve got your back, Apollo! Guys, let’s make this quick.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1005
data.value: With pleasure.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1101a
data.value: Hurry. I don’t want to be here when the rest of the gang shows up.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1102
data.value: Ditto on that.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1202
data.value: Ok, then let’s make some dust.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1301
data.value: Reef, we’ve got the stuff. Give us the coordinates for Raynolds’ vessel.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1302
data.value: Good, good. I just sent them. Reef out.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1303
data.value: The next step’s clear. Just follow the coordinates.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1401
data.value: Apollo, you want to handle this part?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1402
data.value: Sure.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1403
data.value: Ok, wait for the signal from Madelyn. We need to make sure no one’s watching.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1404
data.value: Proceed to the exact coordinates I sent.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1501
data.value: Sit pretty. Wait for my signal.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1502
data.value: I’m checking the guard and maintenance ships in the area.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1503
data.value: When I give the word, rush inside, place the cargo, and return to this position.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1504
data.value: Understood?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1505
data.value: I’m locked and loaded.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1506
data.value: Ok. Two ships beyond the corner, your direction. Stay calm.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1601
data.value: Okay, this is our chance!

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1602
data.value: Get ready… three, two, one – go, go, go!

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1603
data.value: Place the cargo boxes on the points marked on your HUD.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1604
data.value: And hurry, I’m picking up several ships that might head our direction.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1701
data.value: Ok, Apollo, incoming ships. You’ve got about ten or twenty seconds.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1702
data.value: Hurry up, two ships, nearly visual contact!

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1801
data.value: Nice run, Apollo!

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1802
data.value: Thanks.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1803
data.value: A little on the high-stress side, but nice.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1804
data.value: So we’re on our way to Reef again?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1805
data.value: That’s the plan.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1806
data.value: I hope he’s happy.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1807
data.value: We did what he wanted. Now it’s his turn.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1901
data.value: Reef, you copy?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1902
data.value: Affirmative. Nice job. I’ll jump right to the fine print, gentlemen.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1902a
data.value: Consider this a done deal.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1903
data.value: I’ll work for you. But these substance detectors you want to construct…

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1904
data.value: Yes?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1905
data.value: They’re going to be a major pain in the ass.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1906
data.value: I can build them, but I’m going to require some extremely nasty materials.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1907
data.value: Such as?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1908
data.value: I’ve just transmitted you the component list and some additional information.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1909
data.value: Simply put, you need several components manufactured only by OmniCorp and EAC, …

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1911
data.value: …some heavy-duty power cells from the black market and last but not least…

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1912
data.value: …tons of rare plutonium isotopes to keep this thing operational long enough to do its job.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1914
data.value: Good. Any tips as to possible sellers?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1915
data.value: Ha! Most of these items are rare prototypes.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1916
data.value: They won’t be publicly available for three to five years.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1917
data.value: So?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1918
data.value: I’ll be blunt. Apart from raiding Rime…

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1919
data.value: …the only way to get components of sufficient quality is to hit Eurydice.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1920
data.value: Pretty famous research ship built out of an asteroid.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1921
data.value: Doesn’t it belong to OmniCorp?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1922
data.value: It’s currently in the Vandenberg Gas Field.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1923
data.value: And yes, it’s… partly OmniCorp.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1924
data.value: Are you suggesting we raid your own research vessel?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1925
data.value: I am not suggesting anything. Just stating the possibilities.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1926
data.value: You think we can find all the stuff we need there?

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1927
data.value: The components, yes. For the fuel cells, try some black market channels.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1927a
data.value: Iranians or Indians.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1928
data.value: Manjeet.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1929
data.value: And as to the plutonium isotopes – I have no clue.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1930
data.value: Standard plutonium won’t handle the long-range triangulation we need to try.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1932
data.value: I suggest you ask the people you get the fuel cells from.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1933
data.value: Ok, thanks for the info, Francis. We’ll be back.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1934
data.value: I’ve got the approximate location of Eurydice.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_1935
data.value: Guys, when you’re ready, come back to Sapho and I’ll heat up the engines.

data.name: Dlg_Rime_2101
data.value: Dammit! He’s gone!

data.name: Dlg_Rime_2201
data.value: Dammit! He spotted us!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0101
data.value: Here we go.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0102
data.value: Launching the attack. Marcus, Apollo – go after your targets inside!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0103
data.value: On our way.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0104
data.value: Cut off their defenses first…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0105
data.value: I marked the important points of their security system on your GPS.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0106
data.value: Counting on you, guys! We can distract most of their fighters for a couple of minutes.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0107
data.value: Make sure you cut off the stationary defenses and other measures!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0201
data.value: This way, right?

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0202
data.value: Yes. Head inside. This building contains most of the controls and hubs…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0203
data.value: …you need to infiltrate.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0204
data.value: Shouldn’t it be the most heavily guarded part of the base?

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0205
data.value: It usually is. Hopefully the pirate attack distracted them, so you’ll only have…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0206
data.value: …the turrets to worry about, maybe a few fighters.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0207
data.value: We’ll check out the situation.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0208
data.value: Hurry up! Switch off those defenses! We’re under heavy fire here!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0209
data.value: Nearly there. Give us a few seconds.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0301
data.value: This should help.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0302
data.value: Thanks! We’re fine on our own for now. Get to the storage area and grab…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0303
data.value: …the components you need! We’ll take care of the ships outside.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0304
data.value: You’ll need to get to the main warehouse. Turn off the turrets…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0305
data.value: …at the old entrance and the exit door.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0401
data.value: You’re clear to go. Proceed to the old entrance. Use the coordinates from Lorraine.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0501
data.value: The old entry seems to be boarded-up.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0502
data.value: We’ll need to drill or smash our way through!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0601
data.value: Cool, we’re inside!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0602
data.value: Be careful! That pirate attack distracted most of the Russian ships, but…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0603
data.value: …there are still plenty of them around. At least according to my scans.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0604
data.value: Roger that.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0605
data.value: Get to the main storage room. You have the coordinates. Good luck! And hurry!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0701
data.value: The components should be somewhere in this area.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0702
data.value: I did some thorough scans. The placement of the components is marked on your HUD.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0703
data.value: Always a step ahead, right?

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0704
data.value: You know you can always count on me!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0801
data.value: All done here.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0802
data.value: Let’s get out!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0803
data.value: You might want to check out what else is in storage. It won’t take long and…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0804
data.value: …we might find something useful.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0805
data.value: Sorry to cut in, but I have a favor to ask.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0806
data.value: What is it?

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0807
data.value: Our boys were supposed to get us some data about transport ship vectors…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0808
data.value: …in this sector. But none of them made it alive. The data should be housed…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0809
data.value: …in a navigation computer, just a few hundred meters from where you are right now.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0810
data.value: If you can get it for us, we’ll figure out some way to repay you. Make it worth…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0811
data.value: …your while.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0812
data.value: We’re on it.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0813
data.value: I hope there won’t be too much trouble on the way.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0901
data.value: We have the data, ready to exit.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0902
data.value: Make sure to turn off the turrets, if you want to exit by the main door…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_0903
data.value: Otherwise, prepare for a hot shower. Really hot.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1001
data.value: Nice to see you back, guys!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1002
data.value: I can’t wait to see Thomas again!

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1003
data.value: I wonder what our next step will be.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1004
data.value: I’m dying to see the data he prepared for us.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1101
data.value: To all operating ships: The Russians have sent a distress signal…

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1102
data.value: …requesting reinforcements.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1103
data.value: ETA 6 minutes.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1104
data.value: Complete your assignments and return to Famo prior to the arrival of Russian fleet.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1105
data.value: Repeat.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1106
data.value: Complete your assignments and return to Famo prior to the arrival of Russian fleet.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1107
data.value: Roger that. Let’s make it fast, I’m not much in the mood for company.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1108
data.value: Darn. And this was such a nice raid operation.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1109
data.value: Pillaging, looting, ransacking… oh, and don’t forget the marauding.

data.name: Dlg_RussianWarehouse_1110
data.value: Spare the stand-up routine. We need to concentrate!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0101
data.value: Here we are. Silver Foresight. Our last location to place an alien material detector.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0100
data.value: Again, back at our favorite holiday hotspot!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0101
data.value: Let’s not waste time; let’s find Manjeet.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0102
data.value: I’m sure he can help us.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0103
data.value: We’ll find out soon enough.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0104
data.value: If anyone knows how to get super-charged plutonium fuel cells, it’s Manjeet.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0105
data.value: I hope you’re right. Since we have no other leads.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0106
data.value: Doesn’t look like it’ll be too hard to get radioactive shit around here.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0200
data.value: Greetings, my dear friends! What brings you here, business or…?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0202
data.value: We’re looking for plutonium fuel cells.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0205
data.value: We need three of them. What’s your price?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0206
data.value: Considering you did me a favor… I could give them to you as a sign of gratitude.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0210
data.value: Take those fuel cells and use them well!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0213
data.value: One more thing. Manjeet, you happen to know – by any chance…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0214
data.value: …where to get rare plutonium isotopes?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0217
data.value: If you want something really special, mine some plutonium isotopes from the Rift.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0218
data.value: The abandoned OmniCorp mines?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0223
data.value: On our way, then.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0300
data.value: Guys, hurry up, I’ve got a situation here.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0301
data.value: Another local gang flashing their tail feathers?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0302
data.value: Not exactly. EAC Police.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0303
data.value: They say they have an arrest warrant for us.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0304
data.value: We’ll be right there. Hang on.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0406
data.value: Marcus Rainier to EAC Police: What is all this about?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0407
data.value: Mr. Rainier, you and your companions are under arrest.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0412
data.value: We have orders to escort you to court, where all charges will be explained and…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0416
data.value: We did not do anything against the EAC. We’re freelancers.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0418
data.value: You will have a chance to defend yourself in court. We have our orders.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0419
data.value: I’m sorry. We’re not going anywhere without an explanation.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0420
data.value: Could you at the least state the reasons for the treason charges against the EAC?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0421
data.value: As if you didn’t know. Killing hundreds of civilians at the New Landswick survey site.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0422
data.value: Raiding a Russian civilian trade station…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0424
data.value: I repeat, we are NOT going anywhere!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0428
data.value: One little issue. Their motherships have engine disruptors. I can’t budge.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0430
data.value: We need their disruption devices knocked out.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0431
data.value: Destroy them on the way, then dock as fast as you can.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0700
data.value: I am taking heavy fire here. Destroy those engine disruptors – quick! …

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0701
data.value: …or we won’t make it!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0702
data.value: We’ll take out the one on the left, me and Valentin.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0703
data.value: Count on me.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0704
data.value: Apollo, you and Tarja, take out the right one.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0705
data.value: Will do!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0706
data.value: Don’t waste time on their weapons and support ships.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0707
data.value: I’m telling you, we cannot win this fight. Our only chance is to escape.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0800
data.value: I’m taking this thing down!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0801
data.value: Come on! Keep pounding that disruptor unit!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0802
data.value: Almost there!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0900
data.value: We’re done here. Apollo, what’s your status?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_0901
data.value: Hang on, the device isn’t dead yet. Almost!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1000
data.value: Done. Madelyn, you should be able to fly again.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1001
data.value: Hurry up and get here. I’m sustaining critical damage.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1002
data.value: Another minute and you’ll have nowhere to dock.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1003
data.value: Then we’ll be there in half a minute!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1100
data.value: Apollo and Tarja, get inside and cover us from the turrets while the engines warm up.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1101
data.value: I’m on it.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1102
data.value: Me and Valentin will hold them off from here and jump in on the way.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1103
data.value: Roger that.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1104
data.value: Don’t even think of doing anything stupid, Marcus! I know that’s your fallback position.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1105
data.value: No worries.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1200
data.value: Apollo, get rid of those missile ships shooting at our engines. Damn, this won’t be easy.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1300
data.value: Guys, would it be too much trouble to take out those fighters in front of us?!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1301
data.value: I’m a tad busy at the moment. Valentin?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1302
data.value: Negative. We’re outnumbered here. You’ll have to take care of them yourself, Madelyn.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1303
data.value: Hell! Okay, whatever. Damn, another hit.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1304
data.value: Guys, take down those interceptors or we’re screwed.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1400
data.value: Man! I guess they were serious about that arrest warrant!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1401
data.value: We’re taking too much damage!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1501
data.value: I can’t move at all, half of our systems are down. Engines at 30%, hull critical.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1502
data.value: We’re dead meat.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1600
data.value: Damn, I scanned the ship and its weapon systems.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1602
data.value: You won’t be able to defeat it with your weapons.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1603
data.value: I know. I’m not going to use my weapons.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1604
data.value: Guys and gals, it’s been an honor…

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1605
data.value: Wha-what are you planning to do?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1606
data.value: I hope you’re not thinking of–

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1607
data.value: Sometimes that’s the only solution… Take care, guys.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1608
data.value: Have you lost your mind, Marcus?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1609
data.value: There is no other way.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1610
data.value: There’s always another way! This is not the way we do things.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1611
data.value: Do you understand? We can tr–

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1612
data.value: What must be done must be done.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1613
data.value: No – Marcus – this is insane! Stop!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1614
data.value: Farewell, little brother! See you on the other side.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1700
data.value: I hate you, Marcus! You hear me? I hate you!

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1701
data.value: Marcus… Marcus?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1703
data.value: We can’t let his sacrifice be in vain.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1704
data.value: Now’s our only chance to make it out of here.

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1706
data.value: Madelyn, do you copy?

data.name: Dlg_JunkyardEacAmbush_1707
data.value: I… I set the course to the Rift. Hold on a few more seconds and we’re off.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0102
data.value: …and then what?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0103
data.value: Who knows? Armageddon? Spiritual enlightenment? Tic-tac-toe? Anyway, we’ve got…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0104
data.value: …business to do here first.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0105
data.value: Ok, pay attention now. We’ll approach the cargo storage area and place an explosive…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0106
data.value: …device on its doors. That’ll distract them for a while. Apollo, you and I will head to…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0107
data.value: …the control room. Tarja and Valentin will stay put.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0108
data.value: Nice, there should be some interesting stuff to loot.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0109
data.value: Ought to help me pay for my new implants!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0110
data.value: Tarja!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0111
data.value: Retinal implants.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0112
data.value: Come on folks, let’s move. I’ll stay at a safe distance as usual.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0201
data.value: Ok, Valentin and I will stay here. Head to the control room and do what you need to do.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0202
data.value: Get moving, guys. Watch out for military presence. It’s well known that this…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0203
data.value: …radar array has tactical value.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0301
data.value: So many doors, so little time.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0302
data.value: Hope everything goes smoothly here. My energy’s a little low after that…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0303
data.value: …golf vacation at Reway.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0304
data.value: Don’t worry brother, I’ll pick up your slack. Let’s head to satellite A first, and…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0305
data.value: …reprogram that puppy.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0401
data.value: Damn, a security trap! We’ve set off an auto-destruct sequence. What’s going on?!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0402
data.value: Apollo, watch out! Turrets have been activated…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0403
data.value: Doors have been locked! Destroy that panel overhead, hurry!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0406
data.value: Can you pick up the pace, guys?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0407
data.value: Apollo, let’s head to control room. The main computer should be there…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0408
data.value: Maybe we can use it to turn off the auto-destruct.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0501
data.value: Marcus, what now? Auto-destruct can’t be turned off…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0502
data.value: It seems there are some overburdened aggregators.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0503
data.value: Aggregators? Ok bro, you go destroy the two on the right side of station…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0504
data.value: I’ll take care of these two on the left side.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0505
data.value: What makes you think that will work?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0506
data.value: Hope and faith.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0601
data.value: Great! Destroying the aggregators stopped the auto-destruct sequence.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0602
data.value: Woohoo, they did it!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0603
data.value: That’s our boy.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0604
data.value: Marcus? Are you ready to rock’n’roll?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0605
data.value: Crap! Apollo, get here, fast! I’ve got company.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0701
data.value: Thanks, brother, I owe you again. That was close…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0702
data.value: Come on! Time to hack satellites B and C.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0703
data.value: Agreed. No time to waste.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0801
data.value: Satellite B reprogrammed!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0802
data.value: On to satellite C. Almost there!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0901
data.value: Satellite C reprogrammed. We can start the transmission now!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_0902
data.value: Years of hard work, and it all comes down to this moment!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1001
data.value: Damn it, it won’t start.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1002
data.value: Try to find some components to repair the generator…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1003
data.value: Then we can pull some energy from the lower solar panels to jump-start it.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1004
data.value: Great idea, Madelyn. We can’t be defeated this close to our goal.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1005
data.value: Go!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1101
data.value: It reads “Generator Repair Kit”. Something tells me it’ll work.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1102
data.value: Ok, I’ll get to work. According to the floor plan, the generator is in the neighborhood.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1201
data.value: Good job. Now just redirect energy from the lower solar panels to this generator.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1202
data.value: Hope it’ll work!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1203
data.value: Of course it will, sweetheart!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1301
data.value: Yeah, that’s what I’m talking about.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1302
data.value: We can start the triangulation now. This is quite a moment in history!

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1303
data.value: I’m so proud of you, guys.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1304
data.value: Me too. Seriously.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1401
data.value: Triangulation in progress. Sending echo to Thomas…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1402
data.value: All three detectors are functional! We’re getting the data! I’m picking up results! And…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1403
data.value: You’ve got the locations of more alien artifacts?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1404
data.value: I’ve got a location.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1405
data.value: What do you mean? I thought there were multiple artifacts?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1406
data.value: Ehm. According to the results, one of the spots containing this alien material is…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1407
data.value: …far denser than the others. Also, the detectors don’t seem to be strong enough…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1408
data.value: …to ping all the locations. They didn’t even find the two pieces we already have.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1409
data.value: That means…?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1410
data.value: That means we’ve found one location with one huge alien thing. Am I correct?

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1411
data.value: You are. When you depart from Foresight, pick me up…

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1412
data.value: …and we’ll head together to the marked location. I want to see it with my own eyes.

data.name: Dlg_EacTransmitter_1413
data.value: On our way.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1000
data.value: Willkommen in Reichstag!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1001
data.value: The Nazis have made themselves a pretty spectacular headquarters.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1002
data.value: Thomas arranged us a meeting in the main Reichstag building.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1003
data.value: Head there and find Colonel von Stauffenberg.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1004
data.value: On our way.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1005
data.value: I have this strange… feeling.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1006
data.value: What do you mean?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1007
data.value: Oh, I am not sure. Just kinda feel like committing genocide. Ever get that feeling?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1008
data.value: Maybe it’s the surroundings.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1009
data.value: Let’s stick to our mission!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1012
data.value: Colonel von Stauffenberg.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1013
data.value: Mr. Rainier! Thomas told me of your arrival.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1014
data.value: Did he also tell you about my brother? His name is Marcus Rainier.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1015
data.value: He is being held – unjustly – in Reway prison for treason.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1016
data.value: I was told you might be able to help.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1017
data.value: We will consider lending our support.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1018
data.value: First you must prove you are worthy soldiers and ready to fight for our cause.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1019
data.value: We can talk about the plan in more detail afterwards.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1020
data.value: I suppose you have something specific in mind?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1021
data.value: Recently, we had some… problems with one of our research stations.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1022
data.value: It was taken by a group of… separatists. We need someone, …

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1023
data.value: …preferably from outside of the Reich, to go there, secure the research data…

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1024
data.value: …and neutralize the facility.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1025
data.value: Any other information we might need?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1026
data.value: No. This is a fairly standard operation.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1027
data.value: But I hope you have a strong stomach, Mr. Rainier – it is a biological research lab.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1028
data.value: Not a problem. Will this guarantee us your favor?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1029
data.value: No promises. But the Reich rewards those who are loyal to our cause.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1030
data.value: We will talk later.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1031
data.value: Apollo out. Madelyn, I am sending you the coordinates for a Nazi research lab.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1032
data.value: Get ready, I’m docking in a minute.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1033
data.value: Roger that.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1034
data.value: We’re visiting a Nazi research lab? My childhood dreams, at last, are coming true?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1035
data.value: Valentin?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1036
data.value: Just joking. You know me.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1037
data.value: Consider getting some supplies before departure, Apollo.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagA_1038
data.value: But that’s up to you. I’m ready when you are.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1000
data.value: Colonel von Stauffenberg?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1001
data.value: We’re back. Mission successful. Pretty nasty business, I must say!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1002
data.value: Soldiers follow orders. That is how it works. You proved strong, Mr. Rainier.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1003
data.value: You flatter me, Colonel.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1004
data.value: Strong enough for our cause. Shall we discuss your… request?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1005
data.value: Have you considered giving us your support with Reway?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1006
data.value: Whether it’s a frontal assault or some other way to get my brother out?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1007
data.value: Indeed. We already had a plan in place for attacking Reway.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1008
data.value: You see, many of our own officers and brave soldiers are being held there.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1009
data.value: However, the attack is scheduled months from now.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1010
data.value: And I know your brother is sentenced to death within a few days.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1011
data.value: So what do you suggest?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1012
data.value: I would propose to attack earlier. However, at the moment, …

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1013
data.value: …it is militarily impossible for us – thanks to some small… “internal” problems.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1014
data.value: Internal problems?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1015
data.value: The base you were sent to – the one that was taken over by separatists;

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1016
data.value: …it was not the only one.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1017
data.value: This group calling themselves the White Wolves –

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1018
data.value: they’ve grown in strength over the past few months. We need to strike at their heart.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1019
data.value: Some time ago, they took over one of our most important mothership construction sites.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1020
data.value: As I’m sure you can understand, …

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1021
data.value: …we do not want the other factions to know about this issue until it is resolved.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1022
data.value: We cannot attack the facility directly.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1023
data.value: Perhaps we can aid you.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1024
data.value: That’s what I hoped.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1025
data.value: And that is why I “tested” your skills and allegiance during the last assignment.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1026
data.value: If you solve this White Wolves problem of ours,

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1027
data.value: I will do my best to convince our leadership to attack Reway as soon as possible.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1028
data.value: So… what’s the plan?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1029
data.value: Infiltrate Doppelburg.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1030
data.value: We have a few loyal men there, so you should be able to get inside without a problem.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1031
data.value: Take over the command center and disable the base defenses. Are you in?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1032
data.value: Affirmative.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1033
data.value: Perfect.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1034
data.value: Stop by the shipyard to pick up your own Fourth Reich fighters.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1035
data.value: This document will ensure you receive them from the supply officer without any problems.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1036
data.value: Once on board, proceed to landing bay 3.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1037
data.value: A transport ship will be waiting for you there, the one that will take you to Doppelburg.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1038
data.value: Confirmed. On my way.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1039
data.value: Once you take over Doppelburg – send us a signal.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1040
data.value: We’ll come to your aid and help knock out the zeppelins painlessly.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1041
data.value: This should be it.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1042
data.value: Brand new vehicles at our command!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1043
data.value: Good day, how may I serve?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1044
data.value: We are here for re-equipping. This document was signed by Colonel von Stauffenberg.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1045
data.value: Good, good. You are to pick up three Baer B13 fighters.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1046
data.value: Head to the end of the hall, section S7.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1047
data.value: Great, thanks!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1048
data.value: You are welcome.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1049
data.value: Enjoy the best one-seat fighters in all of known space!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1050
data.value: Here we go. Take your pick, Apollo.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1051
data.value: Good choice. I’ll take that one.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1052
data.value: I think they’re all exactly the same.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1053
data.value: I see you are ready for takeoff.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1054
data.value: Make sure to check out the armory for weapons and other equipment you might find useful.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1055
data.value: Thanks; it might prove useful to get some new stuff.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1056
data.value: Wow, some of this gear kicks major ass!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1057
data.value: Let’s go shopping!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1058
data.value: If you want something else, Apollo, feel free to browse again.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1059
data.value: Otherwise, me and Valentin are ready for departure.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1060
data.value: Hail! You are the infiltrator squad for Doppelburg, correct?

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1061
data.value: Yes.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1062
data.value: Right on time. Please head inside.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1063
data.value: The soldiers assigned to your command are already waiting!

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1064
data.value: Helping one Nazi group against another. Not sure how I feel about this.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1065
data.value: Best not to feel too much.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1000
data.value: Approaching the Jingzhou refinery!

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1001
data.value: I’m going through the main entrance.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1002
data.value: Apollo, you take the back door together with Tarja. Use the coordinates from Manjeet.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1003
data.value: On our own. See you later, bro!

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1004
data.value: We need to cut our way through!

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1005
data.value: God! What is this place? They can blow up a whole planet with those nukes.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1006
data.value: Seems like the Chinese are up to something. I prefer not to know what.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1007
data.value: This is none of our business, anyway. Let’s keep to our objectives.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1008
data.value: Holy shit! What is this place? Manjeet, this is NOT an ordinary refinery.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1009
data.value: Well… I should have mentioned that. Oh, and I forgot, I need a small favor from you.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1010
data.value: Changing our agreement on the fly?

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1011
data.value: Just a small favor.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1012
data.value: I will give you some cash on top of the artifact if you do this for me.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1013
data.value: What do you want?

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1014
data.value: I will send you a program. Upload it to the main computer.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1015
data.value: Sounds simple enough.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1016
data.value: That’s what I say. And you will be doing me a great favor.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1017
data.value: Done. On we go.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1018
data.value: Good, follow the plan.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1019
data.value: By the way, what did I just do?

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1020
data.value: Planted a kind of virus. You’ve just sent me crucial data from their nuclear research…

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1021
data.value: …and at the same time bugged their system.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1022
data.value: That’s fine with me. I don’t like the Chinese, anyway.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1023
data.value: Apollo, if you don’t mind…

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1024
data.value: Yes?

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1025
data.value: One more small computer hack. I will increase your reward, honestly!

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1026
data.value: If I had known about this room before, I would have given you better equipment.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1027
data.value: Why are you so interested in this one?

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1028
data.value: It is a communication center.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1029
data.value: It connects the refinery with all the surrounding mines and ships.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1030
data.value: It would be helpful to me for business reasons.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1031
data.value: Sounds innocent. Just don’t screw us with the reward, you understand?

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1032
data.value: No need to be rude, Mr. Rainier! I am a man of honest trade!

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1033
data.value: Done.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1034
data.value: I hope we can finally get to the command center now and get the cargo transport clearance.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1035
data.value: The path leads through living quarters. This area should not be well protected.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1036
data.value: Use the back door. The best way to the command center is through an old abandoned pathway.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1037
data.value: Gotta love an old abandoned pathway!

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1038
data.value: This is it. Hack this computer to change the cargo transport clearance.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1039
data.value: I just got the clearance. I’ll try to delay the scheduled departure…

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1040
data.value: …but we don’t want to make anyone suspicious.

data.name: Dlg_ChineseRefinery_1041
data.value: I’ll grab you on the way, just get out fast and jump in.

data.name: Dlg_EACSurveySite_0301b
data.value: What the hell are they up to?!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0101
