data.value: Here we are. Damien Dust Field.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0102
data.value: I remember this from cadet classes. Is this all that’s…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0103
data.value: Yes, the remains of the Solar Event. All that’s left.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0104
data.value: It used to be a part of Mars. Then… blammo.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0301
data.value: That was the last one!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0302
data.value: Well done!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0401
data.value: Another squad coming.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0402
data.value: Well, well! What ’ave we here, guests for dinner!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0403
data.value: We’re here to negotiate!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0404
data.value: Diplomats, eh?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0405
data.value: Our diplomacy skills are a bit rusty! On guard!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0406
data.value: Hmm, that sounded familiar.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0408
data.value: You will regret this!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0409
data.value: Die, interlopers!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0501
data.value: Arrgh, that was easier than snackin’ on doughboys.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0503
data.value: Hmm, did someone open a can of ego around here?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0504
data.value: Knocking out a handful of stragglers is not the same as attacking a…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0505
data.value: …fully fortified pirate base.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0506
data.value: Next time, do it the diplomatic way.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0507
data.value: We’re always diplomatic.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0618
data.value: I suggest you state your business.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0624
data.value: Listen, here’s the deal. Some Russians are going to come after you…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0625
data.value: The same ones that killed our friends. They’re after something WE want.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0626
data.value: And they have your coordinates, just like we did. It’s only a matter of time…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0627
data.value: …before they pay you a visit. And I’m not talking days.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0628
data.value: Got it. We need to prepare. So… we have common enemies.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0701
data.value: Let’s just say we’ll cooperate. For now.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0705
data.value: What do you need us to do?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0706
data.value: We can’t fight off a whole Russian armada.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0707
data.value: No, but together we can delay them. I’ll send a distress signal…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0708
data.value: …to some allied pirate clans, but it will take time for them to get here.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0709
data.value: Give us a hand in building our base defenses. Just pick a good spot.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0801
data.value: First get the equipment you’ll need at the Supply Base.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0901
data.value: Enemy incoming!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0902
data.value: How long till your pirate friends arrive?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0903
data.value: The first squad just arrived. The main fleet of mother ships is a few minutes away.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0904
data.value: Sounds good.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0905
data.value: Prepare to fight! Take cover and attack in squads!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1001
data.value: Holy crap! They’re crushing the asteroids!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1002
data.value: Hope your friends get here soon, or the same thing’ll happen to us.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1003
data.value: We can hold off the fighters, but once those motherships get here, we’ll have no chance.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1004
data.value: I know. Trust me, we’ll make it.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1101
data.value: Ready for reinforcements, lass?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1102
data.value: Never leave a damsel in distress!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1103
data.value: Battleschooner operational!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1104
data.value: Our friends are here!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1105
data.value: Man the cannons, lads!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1106
data.value: Ramming speed!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1107
data.value: Enemy on the horizon!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1108
data.value: Let’s put these bilge-suckers out of business!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1109
data.value: Revenge is delicious.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1110
data.value: Let’s hit them hard!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1201
data.value: The Russian mother ships are returning!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1202
data.value: Damn!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1203
data.value: We can beat them! Come on!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1204
data.value: Not this time. We’re lucky to have come out of that skirmish alive…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1205
data.value: You can have your revenge later.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1206
data.value: Can’t we just join the pirates and hunt them down? One more time?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1207
data.value: Once they hit interstellar speed, we’ll lose them.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1208
data.value: Live to fight another day, guys. Next time we won’t let them escape.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1209
data.value: That’s a solemn promise!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1210
data.value: I guess that’ll have to do for now.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1301
data.value: You guys, come to my base, I have a tasty surprise for you.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1302
data.value: Does she mean…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1303
data.value: Dream on, brother. Come on!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1401
data.value: Now. What brought you here? And how did you find about those Russians and the artifacts?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1402
data.value: It’s a long story.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1404
data.value: We were on a survey operation at New Landswick. Got ambushed by the Russians, most of…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1405
data.value: …the base personnel were killed, we managed to escape. Our only lead was the Russians’…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1406
data.value: …communication data, which led us to the Laika trade station. When we got there, we…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1407
data.value: …were ambushed again, but their mother ships were still back at New Landswick, so…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1408
data.value: …we were able to make it. We picked up a couple of clues there – one led to your base, …

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1409
data.value: …the other was the name of a scientist, Thomas Barth. We checked him out first…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1410
data.value: …and got some dirt about the alien artifacts the Russians are after…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1411
data.value: And now – here we are.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1412
data.value: Our story is simpler. We were on a raid and stumbled on an isolated base. Looked like…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1413
data.value: …some half-operational Russian storage depot. Once we launched the attack, we realized…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1414
data.value: …that was just a cover – it was a fully operational military base. Still, we won. We…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1415
data.value: …found some nasty weapons and equipment, along with one antiquity. You know, the thing…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1416
data.value: …you call an alien artifact.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1417
data.value: So, you have it? You have it here?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1418
data.value: Nah. We sold it to a smuggler, one of our “business partners”.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1423
data.value: Can you put us in contact with him?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1424
data.value: Guys, don’t forget about the transmitter we need for Thomas. I suggest…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1425
data.value: …we handle that job first.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1426
data.value: He might sell the artifact before we get to him.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1427
data.value: I can arrange a meeting with him. But it might take some time. What kind…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1428
data.value: …of transmitter do you have in mind, by the way?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1429
data.value: A long-range model. Something heavy duty. It doesn’t have to be…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1430
data.value: …super hi-tech — we just need the components.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1431
data.value: I have a suggestion. I’ll arrange you the meeting with Manjeet the smuggler and meanwhile…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1432
data.value: We’ll raid a Russian warehouse called Bratsk. Together. Simple stuff, nothing military.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1433
data.value: Where have I heard that before?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1434
data.value: No, really. It’s just a machinery factory and warehouse. We attack, you disable…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1435
data.value: …the defenses and take the components you need. We loot the rest…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1436
data.value: How does that sound to you?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1440
data.value: We’re in.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1441
data.value: Sounds like a deal. Check out the suppliers here at the base, make sure you have…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1442
data.value: …enough fuel and ammo.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1443
data.value: Once you’re ready, dock in, I’ll get the coordinates from Lorraine.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1501
data.value: I think I like it!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1502
data.value: Like I said, keep it.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_1503
data.value: And when you’re stocked up and ready for Bratsk, dock in!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0201
data.value: How are we supposed to find the pirate base in all of this?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0202
data.value: We do have some electromagnetic signals, I’ll try to…

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0203
data.value: Well, well! What ’ave we here, guests for dinner!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0204
data.value: Jolly Roger ahead.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0205
data.value: We’re here to discuss something, not to fight you.

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0206
data.value: Diplomats, eh?

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0207
data.value: Our diplomacy skills are a bit rusty!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0208
data.value: On guard!

data.name: Dlg_PirateBase_0209
data.value: You will regret this.

data.name: Dlg_EACSurveySite_0804
data.value: Our next stop is Russian Trade Station Laika, the station with which the Russian…

data.name: Dlg_EACSurveySite_0805
data.value: …motherships had an open communication channel during the assault on EAC Survey Site.

data.name: Dlg_ReichstagC_1022_2
data.value: It is protected by heavy rail guns and we cannot afford losses at the moment.

data.name: Dlg_AlienGate_0524_2
data.value: This discovery means a great deal to me, Mr. Rainier.

data.name: Dlg_AlienGate_0602_2
data.value: The rest of us – get to the nearest asteroids.

data.name: Dlg_ResearchVessel_1035
data.value: …and phase antennas, and a feed horn.
